longBusinessSummary: Vibra Energia S.A. manufactures, processes, distributes, trades, transports, imports, and exports oil-based products, lubricants, and other fuels. The company markets crude oil-based fuels, vehicular natural gas, biofuels, and convenience products through dealers; and supplies liquid fuels, lube oils, Arla 32, and related services. It also processes and distributes products, such as sulfur, hydrocarbon solvents, and chemical specialties, as well as provides aviation products and services at airport to domestic and overseas airlines. In addition, it offers renewable energy solutions; and operates gas stations. Vibra Energia S.A. was incorporated in 1971 and is headquartered in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
